event.title: Local FSFE Group Meeting with Matthias Kirschner in Berlin, Germany in Berlin, Germany

body.p:
This Thursday January 12, Matthias Kirschner will give an inspiring talk about "The long way to empower people to control technology" for the FSFE Berlin group meeting.
This is a replacement date for the cancelled talk of November, 10 2016.
New guests are welcome! Official start of the talk is at 20:00 but many of us will be there from 19:30 to grab some affordable and tasty snacks at the e-lok. Location: e-Lok Jugendclub, Laskerstra√üe 6-8, 10245 Berlin
